Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Greenhead Farm, Alva, Clackmannanshire, Scotland, UK Prizes - 1st £15 and cornet, 2nd £10 and cornet, 3rd £7 and tenor horn, 4th £4 and trombone, 5th £3. 1st contest promoted by Alva Town Band 6 bands competed
